front.title: Traffic Engineering Extensions to OSPF for Generalized MPLS (GMPLS) Control of Evolving G.709 OTN Networks

abstract.t: ITU-T Recommendation G.709 [G.709-2012] has introduced new fixed and flexible Optical Data Unit (ODU) containers, enabling optimized support for an increasingly abundant service mix. This document describes Open Shortest Path First - Traffic Engineering (OSPF-TE) routing protocol extensions to support Generalized MPLS (GMPLS) control of all currently defined ODU containers, in support of both sub-lambda and lambda level routing granularity.
